description: Proposal for a side infill & rear (wrap around) extension, new rooflight to rear outrigger roof, replacement and modification of existing front bay window, replacement of all existing windows, repair existing brickwork, new chimney flue, removal of chimney breast, lowering of rear outrigger floor level and changes to basement for storage use, and all associated works.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-4354f047-7fff-98bb-3c17-4fd798a27f5a"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the commencement of the relevant part of the work, the applicant shall submit, and have approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, a detailed drawing, full specifications and a detailed management and maintenance plan of the biodiverse roof with a minimum substrate depth of 80mm, not including the vegetative mat. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved and shall be fully implemented before the premises are first occupied.</span></span></p><p>REASON: To enhance the character and ecology of the development, to provide undisturbed refuges for wildlife, to promote sustainable urban drainage and to enhance the performance and efficiency of the proposed building.<br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8720acc6-7fff-3173-0131-78944c25314b"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Chimney Flue: </span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8720acc6-7fff-3173-0131-78944c25314b"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to installation, details of the appliance serving the new flue shall be submitted and approved to the local planning authority. The details will be required to demonstrate that the appliance is on the list of DEFRA approved appliances and, is therefore, suitable for use within a Smoke Control Area. The appliance shall, thereafter, be maintained and used in accordance with the manufacturer's instructions.</span></span></p><p>Reason:&nbsp;<span id="docs-internal-guid-8720acc6-7fff-3173-0131-78944c25314b"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">To ensure that the appliance meets the requirements regarding the London Borough of Hackney being a designated smoke control area.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></p><p><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, prior to the commencement of the relevant part of works. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved which shall be implemented in full prior to the first occupation/use of the development.&nbsp;</span><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;i) Details of the proposed windows in the form of 1:5 horizontal and vertical section drawings of details showing the material, profile and dimensions of the glazing bars at their junction with the glazing units; the location and depth of the glazing units; the sash boxes with weights, pulleys and cords.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">ii) Details of the proposed window openings in the form of 1:20 horizontal and vertical section drawings showing the location of the window in the reveal, the position of the sash boxes and the material, construction and dimensions of the window arches and window cills.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">iii) Details of all facing materials to be used in the development&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">REASON: To ensure that the proposal does not detract from the character and appearance of the host building and surrounding area.&nbsp;<br></p><div><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
